ValidationRule.description: Condition Search Group Name must be unique.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( UPPER(Name) = UPPER(VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.Fields.Name , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.Fields.Name, Name )),
not( Id=VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.Fields.Id , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.Fields.Name, Name )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Condition Search Group Name already exists, please enter different Name.
